title: Andromeda Watch Face
summary: Andromeda watch face. A futuristic watch face designed for Android Wear.
developerAddress:
Suite 903 - 716 The West Mall
Toronto, ON, Canada
M9C 4X6
description: Red Bred Inc plans to go the distance to change the way we tell time. Each watch face is designed with the intent of being different and completely unique. Red Bred's goal is to create watch faces that will help make Android Wear watches known for being new and innovative. Andromeda is one of many Red Bred watch faces designed through geometric design.Supports any android wear device running Android 5.0+ and smart phones running Android 4.1 or higher. Please contact hcelic@theredbred.com if you have issues with the watch face or bugs to report.The Andromeda watch face is best viewed under screen brightness setting 2-3 or Auto. This watch face only functions on devices running Android Wear. The watch face supports customization through colors. There are over 9000 color combinations that can be set, this watch face will match with your outfit or rarely grow old on any user. Rating and reviewing the watch face is appreciated and will be taken seriously. Updates will be made in a timely manner to offer more of what users want to see and wear on their watch.Pictures of watch faces can be submitted to hcelic@theredbred.com or submitted for sharing or re-posting via any social media channel using @redbredinc.Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Google+ to follow what Red Bred is working on and its growth.
descriptionHTML:
Red Bred Inc plans to go the distance to change the way we tell time. Each watch face is designed with the intent of being different and completely unique. Red Bred's goal is to create watch faces that will help make Android Wear watches known for being new and innovative. Andromeda is one of many Red Bred watch faces designed through geometric design.

Supports any android wear device running Android 5.0+ and smart phones running Android 4.1 or higher. Please contact hcelic@theredbred.com if you have issues with the watch face or bugs to report.

The Andromeda watch face is best viewed under screen brightness setting 2-3 or Auto. This watch face only functions on devices running Android Wear.

The watch face supports customization through colors. There are over 9000 color combinations that can be set, this watch face will match with your outfit or rarely grow old on any user.

Rating and reviewing the watch face is appreciated and will be taken seriously. Updates will be made in a timely manner to offer more of what users want to see and wear on their watch.

Pictures of watch faces can be submitted to hcelic@theredbred.com or submitted for sharing or re-posting via any social media channel using @redbredinc.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Google+ to follow what Red Bred is working on and its growth.
comments: Another great looking watch by red bred that's held back by the technical side, crashes on startup on my Zenwatch 3.

Best one yet! Great addition to your collection, can't wait to see your next one

Greatest watch face of all time This is awesome! Please make more!
Love it Great app. Defiantly  recommended for all the Motorola watch users.
recentChanges: - Fixed crashing on select devices (LG, Huawei... etc) caused by small cache sizes
- Added colors to allow more customization
